example.parse: (TOP (S (CONJ وَ) (NP-ADV (ADJ_NUM أَوَّل) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ما) (S (NP-TPC-1 (NOUN_PROP أَمْرِيكا)) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS حَمَّرِت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN عِين) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها))))))) (VP (X (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3P عَمَلُوا) (PVSUFF_DO:3MS ُه)) (NP-SBJ-2 (-NONE- *)) (PP (PREP فِي) (NP (PRON_3FS ها))) (S (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-2)) (NP-PRD (NOUN قُطَط))))))
